title: Strict Mode (meta-issue)
body:
I thought it might be beneficial to maintain a list of issues related to a potential MSBuild Strict Mode.

https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/2713
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/2642
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/2036

nodes.body:
Decided to use the Strict Mode label instead:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/labels/Strict%20Mode
